definitions.definition: ( chiefly derogatory , slang ) A person who is psychotic , psychopathic , or (broadly) otherwise insane .
examples: The loony bin up on the hill is full of psychos .

definitions.definition: ( chiefly derogatory , slang , loosely ) A person who acts in a bizarre or dangerous manner.
examples: She complained that he was a psycho for driving at such a high speed in heavy traffic.

main_definition: ( chiefly derogatory , slang ) A person who is psychotic , psychopathic , or (broadly) otherwise insane .
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly derogatory , slang , loosely ) A person who acts in a bizarre or dangerous manner.

definitions.definition: A class , at a college or university, in which psychology is taught.
examples: I've got anthro, socio, lunch, and psycho .

main_definition: ( informal ) A class , at a college or university, in which psychology is taught.
